Enum LockStatisticOptions

Used in GetLockStatistics(Boolean) to determine which statistics to display as well as the option to reset values.

Namespace: Figaro
Assembly: Figaro.dll
Syntax
public enum LockStatisticOptions

Fields

Name Description
AllStats

Display all available information.
ClearStats

Reset statistics after displaying their values.
ConflictMatrix

Display the lock conflict matrix.
LockerHashChains

Display the lockers within hash chains.
LockHashChains

Display the locks within hash chains.
LockParameters

Display the locking subsystem parameters.
None

No options.

GetLockStatistics(Boolean)
